dict.string: Solstice needs your location to show you relevant content and people nearby.
Solstice needs your location to show you relevant content and people nearby, even when the app is in the background.
Solstice needs precise location temporarily to accurately show you people nearby.
Solstice needs camera access to let you create videos and take photos.
Solstice needs photo library access to let you share photos and videos.
Solstice needs microphone access to record video with sound.
This allows Solstice to provide you with a better, personalized experience and relevant content.
